results.deck: We Are Doomed is a frantic shoot-em-up in a vibrant world of neon colors.
results.name: We Are Doomed

results.deck: RPG from Arcade County
results.name: Shining Empire

results.deck: 2014's entry in the Magic: The Gathering franchise.
results.name: Magic 2015

results.deck: A new strategy game from The Behemoth headed to Xbox One and PC.
results.name: Pit People

results.deck: Originally Project Totem, Kalimba is a platformer where multiple pieces of a totem pole must be controlled simultaneously.
results.name: Kalimba

results.deck: Disney Interactive is set to include Marvel characters in the next version of its Disney Infinity series.
results.name: Disney Infinity: Marvel Super Heroes

results.deck: Knight Squad is an 8-player, top-down, arena combat game with various objectives amidst the one-hit deaths between players.
results.name: Knight Squad

results.deck: Trap the series' villains in physical traps and hold those traps up to your ear to hear the villains struggle in the latest Skylanders release.
results.name: Skylanders Trap Team

results.deck: A sci-fi themed first-person action runner. Supports up to 32-person multiplayer and the Oculus Rift.
results.name: Infinity Runner

results.deck: A steam punk themed hidden objects game.
results.name: Clockwork Tales: Of Glass and Ink

results.deck: The 26th annual Madden NFL football game.
results.name: Madden NFL 15

results.deck: A puzzle game similar to Lemmings from the creators of Worms.
results.name: Flockers

results.deck: The sequel to Stealth Bastard/Stealth Inc., A Game of Clones features a more open world map and a greater emphasis on exploration.
results.name: Stealth Inc. 2: A Game of Clones

results.deck: SlashDash is a 2v2 capture the flag game featuring teleporting ninjas.
results.name: SlashDash

results.deck: Fenix Rage is a masocore platformer from Green Lava Studios.
results.name: Fenix Rage

results.deck: The 23rd installment in the EA Sports NHL franchise with the promise of a commentary changeover for the first time in eight years, along with revamped physics for both the players and the puck.
results.name: NHL 15

results.deck: An adventure game featuring Sherlock Holmes.
results.name: Sherlock Holmes: Crimes and Punishments

results.deck: Never Alone (or Kisima Ingitchuna) is a platform puzzle game based on the folklore of the IÃ±upiaq people of Alaska.
results.name: Never Alone

results.deck: The sequel to the Zuma-like puzzle game.
results.name: Sparkle 2

results.deck: Diablo III: Ultimate Evil Edition brings both Diablo III and its expansion, Reaper of Souls, to consoles (including the series' debut on PlayStation 4 and Xbox One) in one package with several new, exclusive features.
results.name: Diablo III: Ultimate Evil Edition

results.deck: Mystical First Person Shooter
results.name: Crossing the Line

results.deck: A top down action-RPG from Interceptor Entertainment.
results.name: Bombshell

results.deck: Far Cry 4 puts the player in the role of Ajay Ghale and pits him against a deadly antagonist and an even deadlier environment. Caught in the middle of a brutal Civil War while fulfilling his mother's dying wish, Ghale must fight back against the oppression of Kyrat's leader, Pagan Min, while also battling the ruthlessness of the jungle.
results.name: Far Cry 4

results.deck: A fighting game for PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4, Xbox 360, Xbox One, and PC set in the Dragon Ball Z universe.
results.name: Dragon Ball XenoVerse

results.deck: EA's annual soccer release is back for the year 2014.
results.name: FIFA 15

results.deck: Join Mina and other contestants as they slay fantasy beasts in a 2D brawler to enter Iron Chef-like cooking contests.
results.name: Battle Chef Brigade

results.deck: A brand new Lego Batman game that takes Batman and Robin into an "out of this world" adventure.
results.name: Lego Batman 3: Beyond Gotham

results.deck: This Battlefield spin-off, developed by Visceral Games, focuses on the neverending battle between criminals and police officers, rather than the series' standard military setting.
results.name: Battlefield Hardline

results.deck: The tenth installment of the bloody and storied fighting game franchise picks up decades after the events of the 2011 franchise re-boot, as new and returning kombatants fight throughout the realms over the power of an imprisoned evil.
results.name: Mortal Kombat X

results.deck: Work to fix a broken boom box in this music-based platformer in which staying in rhythm is key.
results.name: Inside My Radio

results.deck: A game combining a remake of detective visual novel Mystereet: Fukagyaku Sekai no Tantei Shinshi and the brand new sequel Mystereet 2: Farewell Encounter.
results.name: Mystereet F: Tantei-tachi no Curtain Call

results.deck: A visual novel developed and published by 5pb. Taking place during the first six episodes of the anime series, featuring an original story starring a new male and female protagonist.
results.name: Psycho-Pass: Mandatory Happiness

results.deck: The sequel to Playground Games' open-world Forza spinoff takes place in Europe, and is coming to both Xbox One and Xbox 360, using a different game engine on each platform. It will feature a dynamic weather system and the Drivatar system from Forza 5.
results.name: Forza Horizon 2

results.deck: The Escapists is a game developed by Mouldy Toof Studios that showcases prison life.
results.name: The Escapists

results.deck: Another entry in the Empires series of spin-offs from the Warriors games, which replace the story mode with an empire building strategy metagame. This one is based on Dynasty Warriors 8.
results.name: Dynasty Warriors 8: Empires

results.deck: The debut game from Question Games, made up of BioShock-series veterans is a first person title blending involved narrative elements with complex gameplay systems. It is a game about making games as players roam an unfinished game world as the "hero" while the developers are shown as giant eyes arguing.
results.name: The Magic Circle

results.deck: The series' second jam on the Xbox One and PS4.
results.name: NBA Live 15

results.deck: Tetris for a new generation, designed to celebrate the series' 30th anniversary.
results.name: Tetris Ultimate

results.deck: The third game in the Unwritten Tales adventure game series.
results.name: The Book of Unwritten Tales 2

results.deck: A Kinect-based fitness game for Xbox One made by Ubisoft.
results.name: Shape Up

results.deck: Ori and the Blind Forest is a 2D Metroidvania game with a strong focus on platforming, story, and atmosphere. Developed by Moon Studios for the PC, Xbox One, and Xbox 360.
results.name: Ori and the Blind Forest

results.deck: A follow up to 2013's Tomb Raider reboot. After the events of the previous game, Lara spends one year searching to explain what she saw. Her quest to explain immortality leads her to Siberia, home of a mythical city known as Kitezh.
results.name: Rise of the Tomb Raider

results.deck: Chronicle the classic Xbox and Xbox 360 adventures of the Master Chief with a compilation of the first four main chronological installments of the Halo series, enhanced for the Xbox One with updated graphics and easy access to every multiplayer mode in the series' history.
results.name: Halo: The Master Chief Collection

results.deck: A reimagining of the unique action strategy game heavily inspired by collectible trading card games. The game will feature a extensive 30+ hour JRPG campaign that retells the original story.
results.name: Phantom Dust

results.deck: An open-world fantasy role playing game from Game Director Hideki Kamiya and PlatinumGames coming exclusively to the Xbox One.
results.name: Scalebound

results.deck: Dance Central debuts on Xbox One as a downloadable only game.
results.name: Dance Central: Spotlight

results.deck: An isometric action-adventure game where players must puzzle and platform their way through tombs and engage in dual-stick shooter combat.
results.name: Lara Croft and the Temple of Osiris

results.deck: Crackdown's debuts on Xbox One, with series creator David Jones and his company, Cloudgine, supporting the project.
results.name: Crackdown 3

results.deck: A new game from Limbo developers, Playdead, set in a dystopian environment.
results.name: Inside

results.deck: The next title in Ubisoft's hugely successful dance game franchise.
results.name: Just Dance 2015

results.deck: A first-person tactical shooter developed by Ubisoft Montreal Studios. In this installment of the Rainbow Six series, some players are focused on assault where as others are defense-oriented.
results.name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six: Siege

results.deck: A third-person adventure game that melds aspects of both horror and noir themes together.
results.name: White Night

results.deck: The second mainline entry in the Dead Island franchise.
results.name: Dead Island 2

results.deck: A side scrolling beat 'em up where players control the warrior Cardoc as he defends his tribe from the marching Roman army.
results.name: Wulverblade

results.deck: A rhythm game featuring procedurally generated tracks which the player must race through while avoiding obstacles.
results.name: Spectra: 8bit Racing

results.deck: A rebuilt version of the popular mobile game for PC/Mac/Xbox One with new features including 3D graphics, multiplayer, and content sharing.
results.name: Plague Inc: Evolved

results.deck: An iOS/Xbox One strategy game.
results.name: Siegecraft Commander

results.deck: A 3D action platformer for PC and Xbox One that involves a dark, steampunk reimagining of Little Red Riding Hood.
results.name: Woolfe: The Red Hood Diaries

results.deck: A story driven first person puzzle game developed by Storm in a Teacup.
results.name: Nero

results.deck: Pro Evolution Soccer 2015, also known as PES 2015 and Winning Eleven 2015 in some regions, is a football simulation video game and the latest iteration in the Pro Evolution Soccer series developed by Konami Digital Entertainment.
results.name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2015

results.deck: The next installment of the Mass Effect franchise is in development at BioWare Montreal.
results.name: Mass Effect: Andromeda

results.deck: A Shoot Em Up game by Japanese developer Qute, headed to Xbox One in 2015.
results.name: Natsuki Chronicle

results.deck: Shooting Love Trilogy is a Shoot 'Em Up compilation by Japanese developer Triangle Service.
results.name: Shooting Trilogy

results.deck: A shoot 'em up game by Japanese developer Moss.
results.name: Raiden V

results.deck: Players have 60 seconds and one life to move from one level to the next in this dual-joystick shooter. A follow-up to Sixty Second Shooter Deluxe for the PSVita.
results.name: Sixty Second Shooter Prime

results.deck: A downloadable third-person action game from Platinum Games.
results.name: The Legend of Korra

results.deck: Battleborn is a first-person shooter with MOBA-like elements from the developers of Borderlands.
results.name: Battleborn

results.deck: Run, jump and butt-slide into the glorious toy-filled world of Action Henk! Become a master of momentum and defy physics as you race against a band of ragged 90s action figures to once and for all prove that Action Henk is the fastest of them all!
results.name: Action Henk

results.deck: Amazing Princess Sarah is a Metroidvania platformer from the developers of Akane the Kunoichi.
results.name: Amazing Princess Sarah

results.deck: A horror themed puzzle game.
results.name: Whispering Willows

results.deck: A puzzle platformer starring Filo and his multiple clones.
results.name: So Many Me

results.deck: Gigantic is a team action game where players fight to take down the enemy team's Guardian.
results.name: Gigantic

results.deck: A block-matching game based on the 2013 Disney film, Frozen.
results.name: Frozen Free Fall

results.deck: A hunter is reincarnated as a deer in this tale of redemption and challenging perspectives.
results.name: The Deer God

results.deck: An enhanced remake of Bladestorm: The Hundred Years' War, adding fantasy monsters to the menage of enemies.
results.name: Bladestorm: Nightmare

results.deck: LA Cops is a tactical shooter game set in 1970s.
results.name: LA Cops

results.deck: Lovely Planet is a first-person shooter set in a cutesy, colorful world. Players dodge enemy bullets and shoot their way to the end of each level.
results.name: Lovely Planet

results.deck: Overruled! is a brawler game up to 2 to 4 players.
results.name: Overruled!

results.deck: Robo the mouse has to collect Titanium Cheese to unlock the gates and escape the maze it is trapped in.
results.name: Super Robo Mouse

results.deck: Stikbold! is a dodgeball game set in the 1970's.
results.name: Stikbold!

results.deck: A split-screen, multiplayer first-person shooter in which all players are invisible, and must "screen look" - analyze what the other players are seeing - to locate their opponents.
results.name: Screencheat

results.deck: A 2D shooter/platformer from Two Tribes.
results.name: RIVE: The Metal Wrecking, Robot Hacking Shooter

results.deck: The third season of Telltale's graphic novel adaptation. It's expected to consist of 5 episodes.
results.name: The Walking Dead: Season Three

results.deck: Toto Temple Deluxe is a multiplayer platformer from Juicy Beast.
results.name: Toto Temple Deluxe

results.deck: A multiplayer focused 2D action game.
results.name: Mega Coin Squad

results.deck: A 2D platformer following an Inuit father and his son, as they try to survive in harsh conditions.
results.name: Last Inua â An Arctic Adventure

results.deck: Ziggurat is a first-person dungeon crawling game from Milkstone Studios.
results.name: Ziggurat

results.deck: An Unreal Engine 4 powered first-person puzzler which is designed to force players to think outside the box and explore beyond what they know as reality through the eyes of a god.
results.name: Pneuma: Breath of Life

results.deck: Metro Redux is a big overhaul of Metro 2033 and Metro: Last Light that includes significant visual and gameplay upgrades for a more uniform experience across both games.
results.name: Metro Redux

results.deck: An episodic adventure game based around time manipulation from Remember Me developers DONTNOD.
results.name: Life Is Strange

results.deck: Ninja Pizza Girl is a flow-centric platforming game about bullying.
results.name: Ninja Pizza Girl

results.deck: The sequel to Fruit Ninja Kinect.
results.name: Fruit Ninja Kinect 2

results.deck: A roller coaster game from Frontier Developments and Microsoft Studios featuring futuristic roller coasters and destruction, released on Xbox consoles on March 3, 2015.
results.name: ScreamRide

results.deck: The third main installment in the Geometry Wars franchise, developed by Lucid Games. Dimensions is the first entry in the series to be in 3D.
results.name: Geometry Wars 3: Dimensions

results.deck: Produced by The Odd Gentlemen and released under the revived Sierra label, King's Quest is a re-imagined take on the original series.
results.name: King's Quest

results.deck: An episodic Noir game developed by A Crowd of Monsters.
results.name: Blues & Bullets

results.deck: Scrapping the themed army battles of previous installments, War Chest fuses many classic toy themes into one strategy-defense action game (including crossover factions with G.I. Joe and Masters of the Universe).
results.name: Toy Soldiers: War Chest

results.deck: A competitive local multi-player dual-joystick shooter where highly customizable space ships go head to head hazardous space battlefields.
results.name: In Space We Brawl

results.deck: A game in the Farming Simulator franchise, first released on PC on October 30, 2014. The game released on May 19, 2015 for Xbox 360, PS3, PS4, and Xbox One. The PS4 and Xbox One versions of the game feature the first online multiplayer on consoles. New to Farming Simulator 15 is the ability to transform the terrain with wood cutting tools and equipment.
results.name: Farming Simulator 15

results.deck: Gemini is a game about stars. And relationships.
results.name: Gemini
